text: Frankie Avalon (born Francis Thomas Avallone, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania on September 18, 1939) is an American actor and singer. He is best known for his starring roles in a series of beach movies in the 1960s. He was known as a teen idol. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American pop musicians Category:Actors from Philadelphia Category:Singers from Philadelphia
title: Frankie Avalon
